scripts.preview: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path .open-next) { Remove-Item .open-next -Recurse -Force }" && npx --yes open-next@latest build && wrangler pages dev .open-next --port=8788 --compatibility-date=2025-11-11 --compatibility-flags=nodejs_compat
scripts.deploy: npx --yes open-next@latest build && wrangler pages deploy .open-next --project-name vedicmaths --branch=production --compatibility-date=2025-11-11 --compatibility-flags=nodejs_compat
